decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly casting powerful spells with cascade, allowing you to cheat out powerful creatures and disrupt your opponent's game plan. By leveraging the cascade mechanic and synergies with cards like Shardless Agent and Violent Outburst, you can overwhelm your opponent with threats and control elements. The deck aims to win the game by chaining together cascaded spells and utilizing the power of cards like Scion of Draco and Crashing Footfalls. The goal is to apply early pressure, disrupt the opponent's strategy, and close out the game before they can recover.

This deck focuses on utilizing the companion ability of Jegantha, the Wellspring to support an aggressive playstyle. The deck includes a mix of different colored lands to enable Tribal Flames and maximize the power of Scion of Draco. Leyline of the Guildpact and Leyline Binding help control the board while creatures like Territorial Kavu and Nishoba Brawler put pressure on the opponent. Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer provides additional aggression, with a suite of removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Stubborn Denial to protect your creatures and push for a quick victory.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly mill the opponent's library using cards like Archive Trap, Fractured Sanity, and Tasha's Hideous Laughter combined with the creatures Ruin Crab and Hedron Crab. The deck also includes control elements like Path to Exile and Prismatic Ending, along with card draw and filtering with cards like Preordain and Visions of Beyond. Snapcaster Mage provides extra utility by flashing back important spells. Overall, the deck aims to efficiently mill the opponent while disrupting their game plan with removal and control elements.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and efficiently reanimate powerful creatures from the graveyard using cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Faithful Mending, while also disrupting the opponent's hand with cards like Thoughtseize and Grief. The combo potential of the deck is enhanced by cards like Ephemerate and Fallaji Archaeologist, allowing for explosive plays and overwhelming the opponent with powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Atraxa, Grand Unifier. The deck aims to quickly take control of the game and win through powerful creature beats and disruptive plays.

This deck focuses on ramping up quickly to play Primeval Titan and take advantage of the Amulet of Vigor to generate huge amounts of mana and search the deck for powerful lands like Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle. It aims to quickly assemble the pieces needed to overwhelm the opponent with large threats and combo potential, utilizing land synergies and efficient mana generation to quickly close out games. The deck's key strength lies in its ability to quickly assemble its key pieces and take advantage of its ramping potential to overwhelm opponents with powerful plays.

The deck revolves around using Underworld Breach to recur spells from the graveyard and generate mana with Lotus Field. Key cards like Sylvan Scrying and Tolaria West help fetch important lands, while Twiddle, Hidden Strings, and Vizier of Tumbling Sands untap lands to generate more mana. Wish allows for versatile options, while cards like Preordain and Consider help dig for combo pieces. The goal is to generate a large amount of mana and cast a lethal spell like The One Ring to win the game in a single turn.

The deck is focused on assembling the Valakut combo to deal massive amounts of damage to the opponent. It includes cards that support the combo such as Dryad of the Ilysian Grove to enable multiple land drops and Scion of Draco to reduce the cost of spells. The deck also includes control elements like Teferi, Time Raveler and Prismatic Ending to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The mana base is designed to ensure consistent access to the necessary colors of mana for the combo to function effectively.

The main focus of this deck is to use a combination of cards like Violent Outburst and Living End to quickly disrupt the opponent's board state and summon powerful creatures from the graveyard. By cycling through cards like Street Wraith and Architects of Will, the deck aims to manipulate the graveyard and ensure a successful combo. Generous Ent and Curator of Mysteries provide additional support and card advantage. The inclusion of Force of Negation helps protect the combo from disruption, while Waker of Waves and Subtlety offer versatility and control options. Overall, the deck is designed to efficiently execute its combo strategy while controlling the game tempo.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of counterspells, removal, and powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Time Raveler and Wrenn and Six. The key card in this deck is The One Ring, which acts as a win condition by providing card advantage and control over the game. By utilizing a mix of control elements and powerful threats such as Omnath, Locus of Creation, the deck aims to establish dominance and out-value opponents in the long game. The land base is optimized for consistency and mana fixing to support the control game plan.

This deck focuses on maximizing the counters on your creatures through cards like Hardened Scales and Zabaz, the Glimmerwasp. Using cards like Arcbound Ravager and Walking Ballista, you can quickly build up a threatening board presence and overwhelm your opponent with aggressive plays. The inclusion of cards like Urza's Saga and Ancient Stirrings help you find key pieces of the deck, while cards like Welding Jar and Pithing Needle provide protection and disruption. The goal is to quickly build up a powerful board state and outpace your opponent with efficient threats.

The deck focuses on using creatures with various abilities to create combos and toolbox interactions. It utilizes cards like Chord of Calling and Yawgmoth, Thran Physician to search for key creatures like Grist, the Hunger Tide and Orcish Bowmasters. These creatures can be used to control the board, generate value, and drain the opponent's life total with cards like Blood Artist. The deck is designed to have flexibility and adaptability through creature choices and has a strong synergy between its different components.

This deck focuses on playing aggressively with a mix of creature cards that can deal damage quickly. The key strategy involves utilizing Leyline cards to enhance the effectiveness of the creatures on the field. There is also a companion card included to provide additional value and synergy with the rest of the deck. Overall, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent with fast-paced aggression and efficient removal spells to control the game tempo.
